remarks: Lemma for ~ jensen .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2015.)
statement:
jensen.1 $e |- ( ph -> D C_ RR ) $.
jensen.2 $e |- ( ph -> F : D --> RR ) $.
jensen.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( a e. D /\ b e. D ) ) -> ( a [,] b ) C_ D ) $.
jensen.4 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
jensen.5 $e |- ( ph -> T : A --> ( 0 [,) +oo ) ) $.
jensen.6 $e |- ( ph -> X : A --> D ) $.
jensen.7 $e |- ( ph -> 0 < ( CCfld gsum T ) ) $.
jensen.8 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. D /\ y e. D /\ t e. ( 0 [,] 1 ) ) ) -> ( F ` ( ( t x. x ) + ( ( 1 - t ) x. y ) ) ) <_ ( ( t x. ( F ` x ) ) + ( ( 1 - t ) x. ( F ` y ) ) ) ) $.
jensenlem.1 $e |- ( ph -> -. z e. B ) $.
jensenlem.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( B u. { z } ) C_ A ) $.
jensenlem.s $e |- S = ( CCfld gsum ( T |` B ) ) $.
jensenlem.l $e |- L = ( CCfld gsum ( T |` ( B u. { z } ) ) ) $.
jensenlem.3 $e |- ( ph -> S e. RR+ ) $.
jensenlem.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( CCfld gsum ( ( T oF x. X ) |` B ) ) / S ) e. D ) $.
jensenlem.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( F ` ( ( CCfld gsum ( ( T oF x. X ) |` B ) ) / S ) ) <_ ( ( CCfld gsum ( ( T oF x. ( F o. X ) ) |` B ) ) / S ) ) $.
jensenlem2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( CCfld gsum ( ( T oF x. X ) |` ( B u. { z } ) ) ) / L ) e. D /\ ( F ` ( ( CCfld gsum ( ( T oF x. X ) |` ( B u. { z } ) ) ) / L ) ) <_ ( ( CCfld gsum ( ( T oF x. ( F o. X ) ) |` ( B u. { z } ) ) ) / L ) ) ) $.
